column5: Any recommendations on a motel in Ft Frances? Looking for acceptable and reasonable. Based on other posts, it sounds like a good idea to get up there on Friday night and cross over and get a good nights sleep.Thanks,Fritz
I've stayed here for three Friday nights on my way north, with a fourth reservation in a couple weeks. Reasonable and comfortable.#####://fort-frances.lakeheadu.ca/~rendvous/
